Entries.{{ModId}}_Chenchi6/e {{ModId}}_Chenchi5/: continue/47 19/farmer 47 19 1 Chenchi 48 19 3/addConversationTopic SSAfterChenchi 10/skippable/fade/pause 300/speak Chenchi "You must be @ the Human.$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Chenchi "Krobus has spoken with me about you.#$b#They said you are very kind, and have helped create this sanctuary.#$b#Thank you for this."/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 200/speak Chenchi "I am Chenchi.#$b#I am a shaman of Yoba.#$b#As a sign of my devotion, I do not speak on Fridays.#$b#I hope this did not offend you on our first meeting.$2"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Chenchi "A quiet one yourself, aren't you?$1"/pause 400/speak Chenchi "I have chosen this mound as my abode.#$b#I intend to make it a temple to Yoba.#$b#You are welcome to meditate here, if such is your calling."/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 200/emote Chenchi 32/pause 300/end/fade
